name: 馬肇石
objective: This is the second year of learning French with this Gambian group. This is the grammar part of learning French. This year we will focus on : past tenses of verbs (passe compose, imparfait), future tenses of verbs (future simple), the use of infinitives (avoir, etre, faire, savoir, connaitre, faire, etc.), masculin and feminin grammar, singular and plurial, the use of adverbs, adjectives, some pronoms. The emphasis will be in writing grammar and speaking abilities for standard French.
